sentences.en: Some seed varieties germinate fast, so check every day or so.
sentences.cn: 有一些品种的种子发芽快，所以差不多每天都要察看一下。

sentences.en: Nitrogen dioxide in the smoke induces the seeds to germinate.
sentences.cn: 烟雾中的二氧化氮诱导种子发芽。

sentences.en: Actually, the seeds don't retain the power to germinate for very long.
sentences.cn: 事实上，种子不能长时间保持发芽的能力。
